title: Agbamoni
author: Agbamoni
content: My senior men way they the building i greet o. Weting carry me come here today na the matter wey they wey be say ah no fit open website or moile app navigate freely do weting i wan do finsish commot, one way or the other na soo soo advert, pop up, redirection everywhere. E just tire me, yesterday i say make i download movie watch before i download this movie i see shege, some website sef force me to play game before proceeding, the oda one say nah survey quiz before i go fit download. Make una share una experience and also share any website to download movies wey ah not go see advert much abeg

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: Op,  most free site (if not all) places ads on their sites since that's one of ways for them to generate income. Though the Ads from each site varies will just characterised them as annoying and least annoying. Most of these annoying sites are actually contain adware, which is a type of malware that fill your device with Ads and pop ups. You should be cautious of the site you visit and software you download and also try to use good ad blockers to avoid most of this annoying sites. Quote from: Macoach on July 22, 2023, 02:20:57 PMWell for me the best website wey you fit download movie without any obstruction from advert or pop ups nah https://thepiratebay.org/index.htmlThis is actually a lie, this site is filled with annoying ads and pop ups

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well you should know that website owners actually pay good money to see that they website has a domain and there are other this that still would be needed to keep the website running, all this cost money and not to talk of the fact that many website were started with the aim of making money, this is just the honest truth.We can consume a service and complain about the things that are used to finance the service we are consuming, the more interesting the website the more you get ads on that we can also see this same strategy on other social media like YouTube.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: If you are unable to disable ads on the settings, go for premium and you will not get ads. For ads on normal sites, use ad blocker.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: E get one way wey you fit use reduce how app pop-ups dey show for your Android phone. Try use some ad-blocking apps; dem dey useful sote dem fit reduce the unwanted pop-ups wey dey disturb you. But you sabi say these ad-blockers fit also affect how some apps dey work, e fit make dem no dey available when you wan use them. So, you gats dey careful how you use am.
